mapper.select: SELECT category, subject, content, hit, ip_address, qna_type, member_id DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as reg_date, DATE_FORMAT(edit_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as edit_date, FROM document WHERE category=#{category} AND id=#{id}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM document WHERE category=#{category} AND id=#{id} AND member_id=#{memberId}
SELECT COUNT(id) FROM document WHERE category=#{category} AND id=#{id} AND user_pw=password(#{userPw})

SELECT id, category, member_id, subject, content, hit, DATE_FORMAT(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date FROM document
category=#{category}
AND (
subject LIKE concat('%', #{subject}, '%')
OR content LIKE concat('%', #{content}, '%')
)
ORDER BY id DESC
